title: Can a foreigner attend a live K-pop audition in Korea? - Quora

response.answer_text: Everyone in the world is allowed to attend live or online kpop audition regardless of their age, region, religion, color and language. But due to COVID-19 live auditions are closed. So, it is better that you should go for online audition. You can get more information by searching the websites of kpop companies.

Yes you can. Just regularly keep a check on K-pop companies' websites to know their monthly audition schedule and accordingly book your flight tickets✈️. Remember to give your all and be confident. All the best 👍. Thanks for reading ❤️
